titleStmt.title: A true relation of the powerfull hand of God upon John Ingram At the reading of the booke called The leaves of the tree of life for the healing of the nations: lately written, by the light of God shining upon William Sedgwick.
titleStmt.author: Ingram, John, fl. 1648.
Sedgwick, William, 1609 or 10-1669?, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed, and are to be sold at the black spread-Eagle, at the west end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Erroneously attributed by Wing to William Sedgwick.

An unsigned passage on title page: The wrath of God is revealed from heaven against all ungodlinesse and unrighteousnesse of men, .. Fear God, and give glory to him; for the hour of his judgement is come.; 8 lines of text.
Reproduction of the original at the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the black spread-Eagle, at the west end of Pauls
